welcome_message_body: Welcome to Segamat, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.description: As Sakinah Tomyam is a malay restaurant located in the city.
